statements: SELECT id, username FROM users;
SELECT email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT id, email, encrypted_data FROM users WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT username AS name, email AS contact FROM users WHERE id IN (2, 4);
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT encrypted_data FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email ='example@example.com';
SELECT id, username, email, encrypted_data FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT * FROM user_transactions WHERE amount > 100
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM user_transactions GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_transactions ON users.user_id = user_transactions.user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM user_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT username, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM users JOIN user_transactions ON users.user_id = user_transactions.user_id GROUP BY username;
SELECT * FROM user_data;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, encrypted_data FROM user_data WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_id < 5;
SELECT permission_id, permission_name FROM user_permissions ORDER BY permission_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, encrypted_data FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE username LIKE 'John%';
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_data JOIN user_roles ON user_data.user_id = user_roles.user_id;
SELECT user_id, permission_name FROM user_data JOIN user_permissions ON user_data.user_id = user_permissions.user_id ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM user_data;
SELECT * FROM user_data;
SELECT username, encrypted_data FROM user_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT wallet_id, balance FROM user_wallet ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, private_key FROM user_keys WHERE key_id > 5;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, date FROM user_transactions ORDER BY date;
SELECT username, encrypted_data FROM user_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_wallet ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, private_key FROM user_keys WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, date FROM user_transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM user_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT user_id, data_key, encrypted_data FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, user_id, accessed_at, action FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY accessed_at DESC;
SELECT tx_id, user_id, tx_type, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE user_id IN (1,2) ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT user_id, data_key, encrypted_data FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT tx_id, tx_type, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE tx_type = 'payment' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, encryption_key, created_at FROM encryption_keys WHERE user_id = 456 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
